title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 661.8 - Permit requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 661.8 - Permit requirements

State Regulations

No person shall conduct a new regulated activity on or
after August 20, 1977 on any tidal wetland or any adjacent area unless such
person has first obtained a permit pursuant to this Part. Regulated activities
for each type of tidal wetland zone and for adjacent areas include, but are not
limited to, all types of uses specifically listed in section
661.5
of this Part as generally
compatible use--permit required (GCp), presumptively in compatible use (PIp), and incompatible use (I) for the type of area involved. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
661.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
